title: BPMN 2.0 Simple
description: This is the BPMN 2.0 stencil set specification.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: The descriptive name of the BPMN element.
properties.description_de: Bezeichnung des BPMN-Elementes.

properties.title: Documentation
properties.description: This attribute is used to annotate the BPMN element, such as descriptions and other documentation.
properties.description_de: Der Modellierer kann weiteren Text zur Dokumentation des BPMN-Elementes einfügen.

properties.title: Auditing
properties.description: A hook for specifying audit related properties. Auditing can only be defined for a Process.

properties.title: Monitoring
properties.description: A hook for specifying monitoring related properties. Monitoring can only be defined for a Process.

properties.title: CancelActivity
properties.description: Denotes whether the activity should be cancelled or not, i.e., whether the boundary catch event acts as an error or an escalation. If the activity is not cancelled, multiple instances of that handler can run concurrently.
properties.description_de: Kennzeichnet ob eine Aktivität abgebrochen werden soll.

properties.title: DataOutputAssociations
properties.description: The Data Associations of the catch Event.
properties.description_de: Die Daten-Assoziation für ein eintretendes Ereignis.

properties.title: DataOutput
properties.description: The Data Associations of the catch Event.
properties.description_de: Die Daten-Assoziation für ein eintretendes Ereignis.

properties.title: OutputSet
properties.description: The OutputSet for the catch Event.
properties.description_de: Die Ausgabe-Sätze für ein eintretendes Ereignis.

properties.title: DataInputAssociations
properties.description: The Data Associations of the throw Event.
properties.description_de: Die Daten-Assoziationen für ein auslösendes Ereignis.

properties.title: Data Input
properties.description: The Data Associations of the throw Event.
properties.description_de: Die Daten-Assoziation für ein auslösendes Ereignis.

properties.title: InputSet
properties.description: The InputSet for the throw Event.
properties.description_de: Die Ausgabe-Sätze für ein auslösendes Ereignis.

properties.title: Is Interrupting
properties.description: This attribute denotes whether the Sub-Process encompassing the Event Sub-Process should be cancelled or not.
properties.description_de: Dieses Attribut gibt an, ob der umfassende Subprozess abgebrochen werden soll.

properties.title: Error Name
properties.description: The name of an error definition.
properties.description_de: Name des definierten Fehlers

properties.title: Error Code
properties.description: The code of an error definition.
properties.description_de: Code des definierten Fehlers

properties.title: Wait for completion
properties.description: Determine whether a throw compensation is performed synchronously or asynchronously.
properties.description_de: Gibt an, ob die erzeugt Kompensierung synchron oder asynchron aufgerufen wird.

properties.title: Activity reference
properties.description: The activity related to the compensation event
properties.description_de: Die Kompensierung betreffende Aktivität

properties.title: Version
properties.description: This defines the Version number of the Diagram.
properties.description_de: Setzt die Versionsnummer des Diagramms.

properties.title: Author
properties.description: This holds the name of the author of the Diagram.
properties.description_de: Name des Autors des Diagramms.

properties.title: Language
properties.description: This holds the name of the language in which text is written.
properties.description_de: Sprache, in welcher der Text geschrieben ist.

properties.title: Namespaces
properties.description: Additional namespaces and theire prefixes used in the diagram.,
properties.description_de: Optionale Namespaces, die im Diagramm genutzt werden.

properties.title: Target Namespace
properties.description: Defines the XML namespace of the elements inside the document.
properties.description_de: Definiert den XML-Namensraum, der für die Elemente im Dokument verwendet wird.

properties.title: ExpressionLanguage
properties.description: A Language may be provided so that the syntax of expressions used in the Diagram can be understood.
properties.description_de: Sprache, mit welcher im Diagramm verwendete Ausdrücke beschrieben sind.

properties.title: TypeLanguage
properties.description: This attribute identifies the type system used by the elements of this Definition.
properties.description_de: Definiert das Typsystem der Elemente dieses Diagramms.

properties.title: CreationDate
properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was created.
properties.description_de: Datum an dem das Diagramm erstellt wurde.

properties.title: ModificationDate
properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was last modified.
properties.description_de: Datum der letzten Änderung.

properties.title: ItemSubjectRef
properties.description: Specification of the items that are stored or conveyed by the ItemAwareElement

properties.title: DataState
properties.description: A reference to the DataState, which defines certain states for the data contained in the item.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: Modeler-defined properties MAY be added to an Activity. These properties are local to the Activity. (e.g., Add Customer.Customer Name).
properties.description_de: Lokale Eigenschaften können der Aktivität hinzugefügt werden. Diese werden ausschließlich während der Abarbeitung der Aktivität angewendet.

properties.title: DataInputSet
properties.description: An InputSet is a collection of DataInput elements that together define a valid set of data inputs.
properties.description_de: Ein Eingabesatz ist eine Zusammenstellung von Eingabe-Datenobjekten, die zusammen einen gültigen Satz von Dataeingaben definieren.

properties.title: DataOutputSet
properties.description: An OutputSet is a collection of DataOutputs elements that together may be produced as output from an Activity or Event.
properties.description_de: Ein Ausgabesatz ist eine Zusammenstellung von Ausgabe-Datenobjekten, die zusammen als Ausgabe einer Aktivität oder eines Ereignisses produziert werden.

properties.title: CompletionQuantity
properties.description: Defines the number of tokens that must be generated from the activity
properties.description_de: Legt die Anzahl der Token fest, die von der Aktivität generiert werden müssen.

properties.title: Is for Compensation
properties.description: A flag that identifies whether this activity is intended for the purposes of compensation.
properties.description_de: Ein Flag, das angibt ob diese Aktivität für Kompensierungszwecke vorgesehen ist.

properties.title: is a Call Activity
properties.description: a Call Activity is a wrapper for a globally defined Sub-Process that is reused in the current process.

properties.title: OperationName
properties.description: The descriptive name for the operation element.
properties.description_de: Bezeichnung der Operation

properties.title: InMessageName
properties.description: The descriptive name for the InMessage element
properties.description_de: Bezeichnung der Eingangs-Nachricht

properties.title: InMessageItemKind
properties.description: This defines the nature of the Item. Possible values are Physical or Information. The default value is Information.
properties.description_de: Beim Typ der Nachricht kann zwischen Physisch und Information unterschieden werden.

properties.title: InMessageStructure
properties.description: This defines the nature of the Item. Possible values are Physical or Information. The default value is Information.
properties.description_de: Beim Typ der Nachricht kann zwischen Physisch und Information unterschieden werden.

properties.title: InMessageImport
properties.description: Identifies the location of the data structure and its format. If the importType attribute is left unspecified, the typeLanguage specified in the Definitions is assumed.
properties.description_de: Definiert den Ort der Datenstruktur und ihr Format.

properties.title: InMessageIsCollection
properties.description: Setting this flag to true indicates that the actual data type is a collection.
properties.description_de: Ture signalisiert, dass der Datentyp eine Liste ist.

properties.title: OutMessageName
properties.description: The descriptive name for the OutMessage element
properties.description_de: Bezeichnung der Ausgangs-Nachricht

properties.title: OutMessageItemKind
properties.description: This defines the nature of the Item. Possible values are Physical or Information. The default value is Information.
properties.description_de: Beim Typ der Nachricht kann zwischen Physisch und Information unterschieden werden.

properties.title: OutMessageStructure
properties.description: This defines the nature of the Item. Possible values are Physical or Information. The default value is Information.
properties.description_de: Beim Typ der Nachricht kann zwischen Physisch und Information unterschieden werden.

properties.title: OutMessageImport
properties.description: Identifies the location of the data structure and its format. If the importType attribute is left unspecified, the typeLanguage specified in the Definitions is assumed.
properties.description_de: Definiert den Ort der Datenstruktur und ihr Format.

properties.title: OutMessageIsCollection
properties.description: Setting this flag to true indicates that the actual data type is a collection.
properties.description_de: Ture signalisiert, dass der Datentyp eine Liste ist.

properties.title: TestBefore
properties.description: Flag that controls whether the loop condition is evaluated at the beginning (testBefore = true) or at the end (testBefore = false)of the loop iteration.
properties.description_de: Gibt an ob die Schleifen-Bedingung vor (true) oder nach (false) dem Schleifendurchlauf überprüft wird.

properties.title: LoopCardinality
properties.description: A numeric Expression that controls the number of Activity instances that will be created. This Expression MUST evaluate to an integer.

properties.title: LoopDataInput
properties.description: A reference to a DataInput which is part of the Activity's InputOutputSpecification. This DataInput is used to determine the number of Activity instances, one Activity instance per item in the collection of data stored in that DataInput element.

properties.title: LoopDataOutput
properties.description: A reference to a DataOutput which is part of the Activity's InputOutputSpecification.

properties.title: InputDataItem
properties.description: A Property, representing for every Activity instance the single item of the collection stored in the loopDataInput.

properties.title: OutputDataItem
properties.description: A Property, representing for every Activity instance the single item of the collection stored in the loopDataOutput.

properties.title: Behavior
properties.description: The attribute behavior acts as a shortcut for specifying when events shall be thrown from an Activity instance that is about to complete. It can assume values of none, one, all, and complex.
properties.description_de: Das Schleifen-Verhalten definiert das Auslöseverhalten von Ereignissen, wenn die Instanz einer Aktivität beendet wird. Mögliche Werte sind none, one, all und complex.

properties.title: ComplexBehaviorDefinition:
properties.description: Controls when and which Events are thrown in case behavior is set to complex.
properties.description_de: Kontrolliert wann und welche Ereignisse ausgelöst werden, wenn das Verhalten complex ausgewählt ist.

properties.title: CompletionCondition:
properties.description: This attribute defines a Boolean Expression that when evaluated to true, cancels the remaining Activity instances and produces a token.
properties.description_de: Alle verbleibenden Aktivitätsinstanzen werden abgebrochen, falls die hier definierte Bedingung wahr wird.

properties.title: OneBehaviorEventRef
properties.description: The EventDefinition which is thrown when behavior is set to one and the first internal Activity instance has completed.

properties.title: OperationRef
properties.description: ID-Reference to an operation definition.
properties.description_de: ID-Referenz zur Definition einer Operation.

properties.title: Script
properties.description: Script that can be run when the Task is performed. Related to the Script TaskType, if a script is not included, then the Task will act equivalent to a TaskType of None.

properties.title: ScriptFormat
properties.description: Defines the script format. The script format MUST be provided if a script is provided.

properties.title: subProcessType
properties.description: SubProcessType is an attribute that defines whether the Sub-Process details are embedded within the higher level Process or refers to another, re-usable Process. The default is Embedded.
properties.description_de: Der Subprozesstyp gibt an, ob die Subprozessdetails in einen übergeordneten Prozess eingebettet sind oder auf einen anderen wiederverwendbaren Prozess verweisen.

properties.title: is a Transaction
properties.description: A Transaction is a set of activities that logically belongs together; it might follow a specified transaction protocol.

properties.title: TransactionMethod
properties.description: The technique that will be used to undo a transaction that has been cancelled.

properties.title: AdhocCancelRemainingInstances
properties.description: This attribute is used only if ordering is parallel. It determines whether running instances are cancelled when the completionCondition becomes true.

properties.title: ProcessType
properties.description: The processType attribute Provides additional information about the level of abstraction modeled by this Process.
properties.description_de: Beschreibt den Abstraktionsgrad des beinhaltenden Prozesses.

properties.title: isClosed
properties.description: A Boolean value specifying whether interactions, such as sending and receiving Messages and Events, not modeled in the Process can occur when the Process is executed or performed. If the value is true, they MAY NOT occur. If the value is false, they MAY occur.

properties.title: isExecutable
properties.description: An optional Boolean value specifying whether the Process is executable.
properties.description_de: Ein optionales Attribut, um anzuzeigen ob der Prozess ausführbar ist.

properties.title: is Multi Instance Participant
properties.description: Is used to define the multiplicity of a participant.
properties.description_de: Legt fest, ob der Teilnehmer mehrfach beteiligt ist (Multi Instance).

properties.title: Minimum
properties.description: The minimum attribute defines minimum number of participants that must be involved in the collaboration.
properties.description_de: Legt die minimale Anzahl der Beteiligten an dieser Kollaboration fest.

properties.title: Maximum
properties.description: The maximum attribute defines maximum number of participants that may be involved in the Collaboration.
properties.description_de: Legt die maximale Anzahl der Beteiligten fest, die an dieser Kollaboration teilnehmen.

properties.title: BoundaryVisible
properties.description: Defines if the rectangular boundary for the Pool is visible.
properties.description_de: Gibt an, ob die rechteckige Umrandung des Pools sichtbar ist.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: The descriptive name of the BPMN element.
properties.description_de: Bezeichnung des BPMN-Elementes.

properties.title: Documentation
properties.description: This attribute is used to annotate the BPMN element, such as descriptions and other documentation.
properties.description_de: Der Modellierer kann weiteren Text zur Dokumentation des BPMN-Elementes einfügen.

stencils.title: BPMN-Diagram
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="800"    height="600"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <g pointer-events="fill" >     <polygon stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="1" points="0,0 0,590 9,599 799,599 799,9 790,0" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />     <rect id="diagramcanvas" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="790" height="590" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="white" />      <text font-size="22" id="diagramtext" x="400" y="25" oryx:align="top center" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Start Event
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="1"/>  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="33"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: End Event
stencils.description: The untyped end event typically marks the standard end of a process.
stencils.description_de: Untypisiertes End-Ereignis, welches ein normales Ende eines Prozesses markiert.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="16" oryx:cy="16" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <circle id="bg_frame" cx="16" cy="16" r="14" stroke="black" fill="url(#background) white" stroke-width="3"/>  <text font-size="11"    id="text_name"    x="16" y="32"    oryx:align="top center"    stroke="black"  ></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Task
stencils.description: A task is a unit of work - the job to be performed.
stencils.description_de: Eine Task ist eine Arbeitseinheit. Sie repräsentiert die Aufgabe, die zu tun ist.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx" d="M8,11 L8,21 L24,21 L24,11 L16,17z"/>   <path oryx:anchors="left top" stroke="white" fill="black" stroke-width="1" d="M7,10 L16,17 L25 10z"/>  </g>    <g id="receiveTask" display="none">   <path stencils.title: Collapsed Subprocess
stencils.description: A subprocess is a decomposable activity. It can be linked to another process diagram.
stencils.description_de: Ein Unterprozess ist eine verfeinerbare Aktivität. Er kann mit einem anderen Prozessdiagramm verlinkt werden.

properties.title: ActivityType
properties.description: The Type of Activity.
properties.description_de: Typ der Aktivität

stencils.title: Data-based Exclusive (XOR) Gateway
stencils.description: When splitting, it routes the sequence flow to exactly one of the outgoing branches based on conditions. When merging, it awaits one incoming branch to complete before triggering the outgoing flow.
stencils.description_de: Bei einer Verzweigung wird der Sequenzfluss abhängig von Verzweigungsbedingungen zu genau einer ausgehenden Kante geleitet. Bei einer Zusammenführung wird auf eine der eingehenden Kante gewartet, um den ausgehenden Sequenzfluss zu aktivieren.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    version="1.0"    width="40"    height="40">   <defs      id="defs4" />   <oryx:magnets>     <oryx:magnet        oryx:default="yes"        oryx:cy="16"        oryx:cx="16" />   </oryx:magnets>        <g>        <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <path        d="M -4.5,16 L 16,-4.5 L 35.5,16 L 16,35.5z"        id="bg_frame"        fill="url(#background) white"        style="stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />     <g        id="cross">       <path          d="M 8.75,7.55 L 12.75,7.55 L 23.15,24.45 L 19.25,24.45 z"          style="fill:#000000;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />       <path          d="M 8.75,24.45 L 19.25,7.55 L 23.15,7.55 L 12.75,24.45 z"          style="fill:#000000;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />     </g>    <text id="text_name" x="26" y="26" oryx:align="left top"/>     </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Parallel Gateway
stencils.description: When used to split the sequence flow, all outgoing branches are activated simultaneously. When merging parallel branches it waits for all incoming branches to complete before triggering the outgoing flow.
stencils.description_de: Wenn der Sequenzfluss verzweigt wird, werden alle ausgehenden Kanten simultan aktiviert. Bei der Zusammenführung wird auf alle eingehenden Kanten gewartet, bevor der ausgehende Sequenzfluss aktiviert wird.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    version="1.0"    width="40"    height="40">       <oryx:magnets>     <oryx:magnet        oryx:default="yes"        oryx:cy="16"        oryx:cx="16" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g>      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <path        d="M -4.5,16 L 16,-4.5 L 35.5,16 L 16,35.5z"        id="bg_frame"        fill="url(#background) white"        style="stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />     <path        d="M 6.75,16 L 25.75,16 M 16,6.75 L 16,25.75"        id="path9"        style="fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:3" />       <text id="text_name" x="26" y="26" oryx:align="left top"/>     </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Inclusive Gateway
stencils.description: When splitting, one or more branches are activated based on branching conditions. When merging, it awaits all active incoming branches to complete.
stencils.description_de: Bei einer Verzweigung werden eine oder mehrere Kanten abhängig von Verzweigungsbedingungen aktiviert. Bei einer Vereinigung wird auf alle eingehenden aktiven Kanten gewartet.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    version="1.0"    width="40"    height="40">   <oryx:magnets>     <oryx:magnet        oryx:default="yes"        oryx:cy="16"        oryx:cx="16" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g>      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <path        d="M -4.5,16 L 16,-4.5 L 35.5,16 L 16,35.5z"        id="bg_frame"        fill="url(#background) white"        style="stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />     <circle        cx="16"        cy="16"        r="9.75"        style="fill:none;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:2.5" />       <text id="text_name" x="26" y="26" oryx:align="left top"/>     </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Complex Gateway
stencils.description: It triggers one or more branches based on complex conditions or verbal descriptions. Use it sparingly as the semantics might not be clear.
stencils.description_de: Eine oder mehrere Kanten werden abhängig von komplexen Bedingungen oder verbalen Beschreibungen aktiviert. Es sollte nur benutzt werden, wenn sich das Verhalten nicht durch andere Gateways ausdrücken lässt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    version="1.0"    width="40"    height="40">   <oryx:magnets>     <oryx:magnet        oryx:default="yes"        oryx:cy="16"        oryx:cx="16" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g>      <defs>   <radialGradient id="background" cx="10%" cy="10%" r="100%" fx="10%" fy="10%">    <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>    <stop id="fill_el" offset="100%" stop-color="#ffffff" stop-opacity="1"/>   </radialGradient>  </defs>       <path        d="M -4.5,16 L 16,-4.5 L 35.5,16 L 16,35.5z"        id="bg_frame"        fill="url(#background) white"        style="stroke:#000000;stroke-width:1" />     <path        d="M 6.25,16 L 25.75,16 M 16,6.25 L 16,25.75 M 8.85,8.85 L 23.15,23.15 M 8.85,23.15 L 23.15,8.85"        style="fill:#ffffff;stroke:#000000;stroke-width:3.9" />       <text id="text_name" x="26" y="26" oryx:align="left top"/>     </g> </svg>

properties.title: ActivationCondition
properties.description: Determines which combination of incoming tokens will be synchronized for activation of the Gateway.

stencils.title: Text Annotation
stencils.description: Any object can be associated with a Text Annotation to provide additional documentation.
stencils.description_de: Jedes Objekt kann durch eine Text-Anmerkung kommentiert werden.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="51"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="2" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="left" oryx:default="yes"/>   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="all" oryx:minimumSize="10 20" oryx:maximumSize="" >   <rect   id="textannotationrect"  oryx:resize="vertical horizontal"  x="1"   y="1"  width="100"  height="50"  stroke="none"  fill="none" />   <path   d="M20,1 L1,1 L1,50 L20,50"   oryx:anchors="top bottom left"   stroke="black"   fill="none"   stroke-width="1" />          <text    font-size="12"    id="text"    x="5"    y="25"    oryx:align="middle left"   oryx:fittoelem="textannotationrect"   oryx:anchors="left"   stroke="black">  </text>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: Text Format
properties.description: This attribute identifies the format of the text. It MUST follow the mimetype format.
properties.description_de: Dieses Attribut definiert das Format des Textes.

stencils.title: Sequence Flow
stencils.description: Sequence Flow defines the execution order of activities.
stencils.description_de: Ein Sequenzfluss definiert die Reihenfolge der Ausführung von Aktivitäten.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0"  oryx:edge="edge" >  <defs>     <marker id="start" refX="1" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="17" markerHeight="11" orient="auto">      <path id="conditional" d="M 0 5 L 8 0 L 16 5 L 8 10 L 0 5" fill="white" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />    <path id="default" d="M 5 0 L 11 10" fill="white" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" />     </marker>     <marker id="end" refX="15" refY="6" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="15" markerHeight="12" orient="auto">      <path d="M 0 1 L 15 6 L 0 11z" fill="black" stroke="black" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" />     </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">   <path d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" marker-start="url(#start)" marker-end="url(#end)" />   <text id="text_name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>  </g> </svg>

properties.title: ConditionType
properties.description: Determine the typ of the flow object.
properties.description_de: Legt den Typ des Flussobjekts fest.

properties.title: isImmediate
properties.description: An optional Boolean value specifying whether Activities or Choreography Activities not in the model containing the Sequence Flow can occur between the elements connected by the Sequence Flow. If the value is true, they MAY NOT occur. If the value is false, they MAY occur. Also see the isClosed attribute on Process, Choreography, and Collaboration.

properties.title: is conditional flow
properties.description: System intern variable to set the Diamond invisible, if sourceShape is a gateway and ConditionType is set to Expression

stencils.title: Association (undirected)
关联 (无方向)
stencils.description: Attaching a data object with an Undirected Association to a sequence flow indicates hand-over of information between the activities involved.
stencils.description_de: Die Zuordnung eines Datenobjekts zu einem Sequenzfluss über eine ungerichtete Assoziation weist auf eine Informationsübergabe zwischen den Aktivitäten hin.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0"  oryx:edge="edge" >  <g id="edge">      <path d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3, 4" />   <text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop" oryx:offsetTop="6" style="font-size:9px;"/>  </g> </svg>

properties.title: Responsibilities
properties.description: Describes the type of the responsibility according to RACI.
properties.description_de: Beschreibt die Verantwortlichkeiten nach dem RACI-Modell.
